Text:
Great Upload!
But where can we find the Exercise files used in this E-Book?
GOD BLESS YOU. seriously. you just saved me a lot of ca$h
Was curious if exercise files are available

The link to Peachpit for the training files and fonts doesn't work for me - it needs a logon, and there's no way to create a new account :-(

If anyone can come up with a working link to pick up the disc that goes with the book, that'd be great :-)

OK - I've found the files :-)  This is the address I got them from: http://peachpit.wamnet.com/cgi-bin/cs/mvsrch_front?GMTOFFSET=-46800&KEY=%2BA5PMNGabiGbQ%2B/4DSzGPJGZn1ivFndAyJX4T9RBSYTITIGTCdq1BArM5FMT%2BTVGf3fYzBpgNU6d5KguHi15Akzy950zMxIk4R6zk4QOMnx/epU%2BE8iZGfiSypBa4MpP8Gvohjn1T3IBiovu1CtxHqU0S581MXzd1mlvHm8Pm0HgqVSip98WPfi0Bj6ByzEQFuU548xjjCyJ3JDMpeqzJ6hJtQSJADs2R%2BPedKWG5w0n9iZOtrSyYoVWEc44apiW4%2Bp1LtiY9%2B80VBNG6ACZzOcrU4URRifQFaZUiSsodDlsdtcLxb%2BBo6fawspoXWDAEIWPWLk/dRfN7lxVJjzROVqkMa7BCblBQTyK9lbzDm%2B8POGGkvr%2BQTjduYyc1W6sJhWJSzqxQbPzYCQA8i/LoOUMW8MOTj5NiyVZzJLKMWk7xQOOawLkFlRhdZRZnEDs7jsb%2BZWNKhNBjLlsjgZVIZXpqw4VErvw7%2BQKg9fVOdInwP/pjm%2B8Qywq%2BHGVfx0J7MWAfTFH1vUVspra6r3aVXtTDZuJCTIvHtnvhBLduciBHBtHHW70jzqtlmZvcWTiAFDnBd05JDE%3D
